RelatedSentence: Johannesburg - One of Johnny Clegg 's backing vocalists has been shot and killed during a robbery in Troyville , Johannesburg , Gauteng police said on Sunday .
Bongani Masuku was killed on Saturday night in Princess Street , said Lieutenant Colonel  Katlego Mogale .
Four men approached Masuku as he was parking his car and demanded a cellphone and his car keys at gun point .
